metadata.synopsis: VB when the players see a hook horror on a cliff eating a person.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Magga cammara. That's a hook horror.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Character familiar with Hook Horrors says VBNodeContext: whispered. Straj pronounced stradj, gr'rack pronounced grack, magga cammara pronounced Mag-ah Cam-ah-rah; all mean something along the lines of 'damn it'.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: By the hells, what is that?
